article_title: Bernie Sanders, at Syracuse rally, takes aim at 'billionaire class,' Hillary Clinton, Donald Trump
article_text:
About Eye on NY

Looking for state and national political coverage? Read Robert Harding's award-winning Eye on NY blog for the latest, including news and information about races and issues impacting Cayuga County and central New York.

The blog covers five state legislative districts and the 24th Congressional District, as well as statewide politics and elections.

Eye on NY has received awards in competitions hosted by the New York News Publishers Association and the New York State Associated Press Association.

og.description: SYRACUSE — Bernie Sanders wants to break up the big banks, overhaul the campaign finance system, provide free college tuition at public colleges and universities and raise the federal minimum
